<Meta of={UnstyledListStory} />

# UnstyledList

## Overview

UnstyledList is a component that displays the items in an unordered list.
This component can be used as a replacement for `ul` and it's child component `UnstyledListItem` can be used as a replacement for `li`.

<Canvas of={UnstyledListStory.Overview} />
